Featuring Pikachu enjoying a relaxing soak, this adorable and soothing design is perfect for Pokémon fans. Access your favorite sites effortlessly with popular shortcuts, and personalize your browsing experience by adding custom links. Stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock, and search the web seamlessly using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy Pikachu’s cozy hot bath every time you open a new tab.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly reach your favorite sites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Make your new tab uniquely yours with personal links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on track with a built-in clock and calendar.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web effortlessly with your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
